availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Ireland. Married to Jerry Sheehan. Resident of Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 48. Thirteenth Census of the United States (1910), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Grassy Creek, p. 4. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #2225, Pendleton County Marriages, p. “Jerry Sheehan,” Find A Grave, "Sarah Ann Patton Sheehan (October 22, 1830-March 20, 1917)," Memorial #55496899, http://findagrave.com/memorial/55496899.
